short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AquaAlert is a simple extension to keep you hydrated. Its features ensure you never miss a sip of water throughout the day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay Hydrated with AquaAlert!
AquaAlert is your ultimate hydration companion, reminding you to drink water regularly throughout the day. Designed to be simple, lightweight, and effective, AquaAlert ensures you never forget to take a sip and stay refreshed.  

Key Features:
Simple & Lightweight: AquaAlert is designed to run efficiently without slowing you down.  
Eye-Catching Fill Animation: Enjoy a visually appealing LiquidFillGauge design that tracks your hydration progress.  
Customizable Intervals: Set reminders at intervals that suit your schedule—no more missed hydration moments!  
-Beautiful Notifications: Get stunning popup reminders with soothing sounds to keep you motivated.  

Stay healthy and energized with AquaAlert—because hydration matters!
